31#ifndef _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_DIRENT_H_
32#define _OPENSOLARIS_SYS_DIRENT_H_
33
34#include <sys/types.h>
35
36#include_next <sys/dirent.h>
37
38typedef struct dirent dirent64_t;
39typedef ino_t ino64_t;
40
41#define dirent64 dirent
42
43#define d_ino d_fileno
44
45#define __DIRENT64_NAMEOFF __builtin_offsetof(struct dirent, d_name)
46#define DIRENT64_RECLEN(len) \
47 roundup2(__DIRENT64_NAMEOFF + (len) + 1, sizeof(ino_t))
48
49#endif /* !_OPENSOLARIS_SYS_DIRENT_H_ */
50
